commands.command: SELECT Header, Body, Footer, DateLastChange, Notes FROM SendCheckEmailTextsTbl
UPDATE SendCheckEmailTextsTbl SET Header = 'Is it time to order coffee?', Body = 'Reply to confirm or cancel', Footer = 'visit our website at www.quaffee.com' WHERE (SCEMTID = 1)
SELECT Header, Body, Footer, DateLastChange, Notes FROM SendCheckEmailTextsTbl
